name: Idle Airline Inc.
description:
Idle Airline Inc. takes you into the world of building an airline and scale your empire doing it!

Tap to bring people from terminal, onboard and make money while doing it.

Use the power-ups:

1. Increase the tickets price
2. Increase the flow of new passengers
3. Increase air traffic
4. Increase the frequency and amount of special VIP tickets.

You can also start new terminals for planes and new airports. If you go into idle mode: don't worry, you'll still make money while idle.

Take wise decisions to improve your profitability and scale your empire as quickly as possible!
